transcript.title: Appointment of CEO of Efficiency Scrutiny Unit
transcript.content:
20 October 1986

I am pleased to announce the appointment of Mr A J Ayers,Â AO, as Chief Executive Officer of the Efficiency ScrutinyÂ Unit, working for Mr David Block as Head of the Unit.

Mr Ayers has had a long career in Government service andÂ for the past five years has held with distinction the postÂ of Secretary of the Department of Social Security.

Mr Ayers will take up his new appointment on Monday 27 October.
